core_knowledge.political_control: Lab & Co-op largest party (16 seats out of 45). No overall control.

council_profile.name: West Lancashire Borough Council
council_profile.covers: West Lancashire district in south-west Lancashire, including Skelmersdale, Ormskirk and Burscough
notable_issues: Skelmersdale New Town — legacy of 1960s planned town, ongoing regeneration challenges
Edge Hill University campus at Ormskirk — significant student population
Agricultural land — includes some of England most productive farmland in West Lancashire plain
Benford Law deviation of 8.2%% — highest of all 15 Lancashire councils (WARNING level)
Housing Revenue Account year-end spending 12.7x monthly average in March

data_quality.transparency_notes: West Lancashire Borough Council publishes spending data over £500.

cross_council_context.note: West Lancashire Borough Council is a district council in Lancashire. Comparable to other Lancashire district councils.
